Package pacman.model

Class ScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.model.ScoreBoard
  • public class ScoreBoard
extends java.lang.Object

    ScoreBoard

    A ScoreBoard is an object to keep the record of the Pacman's score in a all runs in a level.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Song Zhang
    See Also:
    Score

      • getBestScore

        public Score getBestScore()
        Returns the best Score in this score board.

        If there is no Score yet, creates an new Score and returns it.

        Returns:
        the best Score in this score board
